name: study-hub
description: A comprehensive educational platform for all subjects.

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf server/public && mkdir -p server/public && cp -r client/dist/* server/public/ && cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate
scripts.seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
